freenet.clients.http
Class HTTPRequestImpl

java.lang.Object
  freenet.clients.http.HTTPRequestImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
HTTPRequest
public class HTTPRequestImpl
extends Object
implements HTTPRequest

Used for passing all HTTP request information to the FredPlugin that handles the request. It parses the query string and has several methods for accessing the request parameter values.

Author:
nacktschneck

Nested Class Summary
static class HTTPRequestImpl.HTTPUploadedFileImpl
          Container for uploaded files in HTTP POST requests.

                       String encodedQueryString,
                       String method)
                throws URISyntaxException
Creates a new HTTPRequest for the given path and url-encoded query string

Parameters:
path - i.e. /test/test.html
encodedQueryString - a=some+text&b=abc%40def.de
Throws:
URISyntaxException - if the URI is invalid

                       Bucket d,
                       ToadletContext ctx,
                       String method)
Creates a new HTTPRequest for the given URI and data.

Parameters:
uri - The URI being requested
h - Client headers
d - The data
ctx - The toadlet context (for headers and bucket factory)
Throws:
URISyntaxException - if the URI is invalid

public boolean isParameterSet(String name)
Description copied from interface: HTTPRequest
Check if a parameter was set in the request at all, either with or without a value.

Specified by:
isParameterSet in interface HTTPRequest
Parameters:
name - the name of the parameter to check
Returns:
true if the parameter was set in the request, not regarding if the value is empty

getParam

public String getParam(String name)
Description copied from interface: HTTPRequest
Get the value of a request parameter, using an empty string as default value if the parameter was not set. This method will never return null, so its safe to do things like

if (request.getParam("abc").equals("def"))

Specified by:
getParam in interface HTTPRequest
Parameters:
name - the name of the parameter to get
Returns:
the parameter value as String, or an empty String if the value was missing or empty

getParam

public String getParam(String name,
                       String defaultValue)
Description copied from interface: HTTPRequest
Get the value of a request parameter, using the specified default value if the parameter was not set or has an empty value.

Specified by:
getParam in interface HTTPRequest
Parameters:
name - the name of the parameter to get
defaultValue - the default value to be returned if the parameter is missing or empty
Returns:
either the parameter value as String, or the default value

getIntParam

public int getIntParam(String name)
Description copied from interface: HTTPRequest
Get the value of a request parameter converted to an int, using 0 as default value. If there are multiple values for this parameter, the first value is used.

Specified by:
getIntParam in interface HTTPRequest
Parameters:
name - the name of the parameter to get
Returns:
either the parameter value as int, or 0 if the parameter is missing, empty or invalid

getIntParam

public int getIntParam(String name,
                       int defaultValue)
Description copied from interface: HTTPRequest
Get the value of a request parameter converted to an int, using the specified default value. If there are multiple values for this parameter, the first value is used.

Specified by:
getIntParam in interface HTTPRequest
Parameters:
name - the name of the parameter to get
defaultValue - the default value to be returned if the parameter is missing, empty or invalid
Returns:
either the parameter value as int, or the default value

                      int defaultValue)
Description copied from interface: HTTPRequest
Get a part as an integer with a default value if it is not set.

Specified by:
getIntPart in interface HTTPRequest

getMultipleParam

public String[] getMultipleParam(String name)
Description copied from interface: HTTPRequest
Get all values of a request parameter as a string array. If the parameter was not set at all, an empty array is returned, so this method will never return null.

Specified by:
getMultipleParam in interface HTTPRequest
Parameters:
name - the name of the parameter to get
Returns:
an array of all paramter values that might include empty values

getMultipleIntParam

public int[] getMultipleIntParam(String name)
Description copied from interface: HTTPRequest
Get all values of a request parameter as int array, ignoring all values that can not be parsed. If the parameter was not set at all, an empty array is returned, so this method will never return null.

Specified by:
getMultipleIntParam in interface HTTPRequest
Parameters:
name - the name of the parameter to get
Returns:
an int array of all parameter values that could be parsed as int

public Bucket getPart(String name)
Description copied from interface: HTTPRequest
Get a part as a Bucket. Parts can be very large, as they are POST data from multipart/form-data and can include uploaded files.

Description copied from interface: HTTPRequest
Get a request part as a String. Parts are passed in through attached data in a POST in multipart/form-data encoding; parameters are passed in through the URI.
